entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Clearing. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 70 in the morning then west 30 gusting to 50 late in the afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 10 February 2023
